CustomField.description: If the field "Request for Exception" is "Funding Deadline, Implementation Start, PD Event, Sales Event/Conference, Sales Presentation", this field must be filled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the field "Request for Exception" is "Funding Deadline, Implementation Start, PD Event, Sales Event/Conference, Sales Presentation", this field must be filled.
CustomField.label: Reason for Exception Date
